content.rendered:
Windsor Brokers Team Comes Together for a Blood Donation in 2023

Windsor Brokers gives back to the community by holding a Blood Donation on 06.02.2023 at our headquarters in Limassol.

Our team came together to be the everyday heroes and provide support and assistance to the local hospitals in a time of need. Their contributions will help countless people who are battling illnesses, having surgeries, and being treated for traumas.

The staff from the Ministry of Health were present to ensure that all health and safety protocols were followed and to confirm the eligibility of donors.

Each person can donate approximately 1 pint of blood per drive. This pint can then be used to save as many as 3 lives.

We hope that our teams’ efforts set an example for others in the community and that the hospitals collect the reserves they need to help patients.
